projects.text: Quick studies and sketchess to capture the essence of a scene.

projects.title: RX Squared
projects.text: This website design for a hypothetical, unisex, crossfit apparel company was eventually coded by the awesome hand of Andrew Nicholas. For the design and branding, I wanted to create an bold and energetic atmosphere while maintaining a relatively gender neutral style. I had a lot of fun coming up with copy for this project, creating new and exciting materials for shoes and
